column1: # Issues Total: 95
# Repository: https://github.com/stripe/pg-schema-diff
# Generated: 2025-08-13
issue_title
Add support for Materialized Views
View support
Bump everything to golang 1.24
[FEATURE] option to write out migration files
[BUG] Constraint triggers generate invalid plans
[BUG] Wrong statement when using `generated always as`
[BUG]: Invalid input syntax for type oid?
[QUESTION] Can I compare 2 schemas named differently?
[FEATURE] Support for policies on partitions
[FEATURE] v13 support
[FEATURE] Diff and preserve comments
[BUG] Foreign keys between tables in separate schemas fail
Check constraints that depend on UDFs
Better dependency tracking for non-sql functions
[FEATURE] Support for domains
Implementing my custom SchemaSource
Question: sql output for plan and excluding tables
[FEATURE] Add support for diffing two schema dirs from the CLI
[FEATURE] Add support for excluding tables
Question: use of pg-schema-diff in a CI:CD pipeline to generate migrations
Question: Is the change ""Generate function to take a SchemaSource"" releasing any soon?
Dependency missed with a function used as default value
[FEATURE] Support switching between non-coercible types via drop/add
Add support for generated columns
[FEATURE] Add support for Postgres 17
Add support for stored procedures
Find Clean Solution to Diffing Hierarchies
[BUG] column already has a default value
[BUG] : Hazard HAS_UNTRACKABLE_DEPENDENCIES
[BUG] cannot drop column of table because other objects depend on it
Hazard HAS_UNTRACKABLE_DEPENDENCIES
Creating a FAQ/Troubleshooting Doc
Support nested directories
[FEATURE] : Support User defined Types
[Question] : Clean up temp databases created on the target server
Add support for identity columns
Cleanup balls of mud
Question : Can we have tables in destination but delete from source
How do you deal with unsupported changes on the db schema?
Include failed statement's file and line in stderr
Create Go script that can replace preceding tabs with spaces in SQL string literals
[Question] : Folder structure for tables
[Question] Why not use `pg_dump --schema-only` to populate temporary database?
mask password for dsn
Add an ability to Save plan files
New columns add are not detected
Foreign key constraints
Support for multiple schema directories?
Merge lock timeout and statement timeout modifier into one parameter
Accelerate migration planning through pipelined statements
Implement retry system
Add support for online Foreign Keys via `VALIDATE`
Fix Test Case Indent Formatting
Create wrapper around schema name maps such that they can only be queried with a SchemaQualifiedName
Add Postgres 16 to Acceptance Test Matrix
Separate Column Diffs from Table Diffs
For functions where dependencies cannot be tracked, create them _after_ all tables have been added/altered
Move data packing tests into their own test cases instead of having them as a inherent subtest of acceptance tests
Row security policies
Allow applying plan without confirmation
Make statement generation and ordering independent
Create a user-facing ergnomic representation of schema
Add ""policy"" replacement
Add support for table privileges
Consider allowing users to define a .pg-schema-diff.yaml file that the CLI will read-in so users can quickly run the CLI
Enums
Generated SQL for new table reorders columns
Unable to resolve sequence SQL
Considering adding warning if a migration's success is dependent on the data
Investigate supabase CLI integration
Switch CLI parameters over to logfmt
Update CLI to allow for multi-schema support
Support for non-`public` schemas
Convert plan generator into a struct to make wiring dependencies through easier
Allow CREATE/DROP INDEX without CONCURRENTLY
Add support for ""online"" `NOT NULL` for local nullability on partitions
Add support for local check constraints on partitions
Make `SET NOT NULL` lock-free through check constraints
Connects to `database=postgres` regardless of `PGDATABASE` value
Evaluate weird quirk of dependency system
Add SQL statement comments
Online Check Constraint Adds
Build PK Constraints Concurrently for Partitions
Unique constraints
Support FK's switching between non-castable types
Cleanup Orphaned Temporary Databases
Create way to visualize dependency graph
Add plugin support
Add per-statement lock timeout modifiers
Incorrect usage of lowercase character
Don't include `ACQUIRES_ACCESS_EXCLUSIVE` lock migration hazard if switching between binary-coercible types
Add ""Correctness"" Migration Hazard
Create guidelines for declarative schema setup
Sequence (and Serial) support
Make it easier to generate plans from custom commands
